definition: something sentimental or trite, to preserve with salt
details:
noun
- something sentimental or trite
= example: something sentimental or trite
- ears of corn that can be prepared and served for human food
= synonyms: edible corn
- whiskey distilled from a mash of not less than 80 percent corn
= synonyms: corn whiskey, corn whisky
- tall annual cereal grass bearing kernels on large ears: widely cultivated in America in many varieties
= synonyms: maize
- (Great Britain) any of various cereal plants (especially the dominant crop of the region--wheat in Great Britain or oats in Scotland and Ireland)
- the dried grains or kernels or corn used as animal feed or ground for meal
- a hard thickening of the skin (especially on the top or sides of the toes) caused by the pressure of ill-fitting shoes
= synonyms: clavus
verb
- to preserve with salt
= example: to preserve with salt
= synonyms: salt
- to feed cattle with maize
= example: to feed cattle with maize
